faqData.question: How does delivery work?
faqData.answer: Delivery is made to your home by a carrier or to the nearest Nova Poshta branch.

faqData.question: Is furniture assembly available?
faqData.answer: For your convenience, our craftsmen fully assemble the furniture before shipping and securely pack it.

faqData.question: Do you offer installment payments?
faqData.answer: Yes, of course. You can pay in up to 4 installments without interest or overpayments.

faqData.question: Is it possible to make furniture to custom sizes?
faqData.answer: It is possible, but for more detailed consultation, please check with our manager.

faqData.question: Do you provide a warranty on your furniture?
faqData.answer: Yes, we offer a warranty of up to 1.5 years.

faqData.question: What materials do you use for furniture production?
faqData.answer: We use only high-quality materials, including new collection chipboard, MDF, hidden mounting hardware with soft-close mechanisms. All our products are eco-friendly, moisture-resistant, and odor-free.

faqData.question: How can I place an order?
faqData.answer: You can place an order on our website and social networks, by calling or writing to us, or by visiting our showroom. Our managers will advise and help you place your order.

aboutTitle: What was the idea behind creating RAMON?
aboutParagraph1: Our company has 12 years of experience in creating custom furniture for modern homes and apartments in the premium and mid-price segments. We have now launched the 'RAMON' serial production line, aimed at making trendy and popular furniture models among our customers more accessible to a broader audience.
aboutParagraph2: When you buy furniture from us, YOU WON'T NEED TO:
aboutList: look for furniture makers to take measurements, and explain in detail what you want;
wait 1-1.5 months for manufacturing during such unstable times for the country;
overpay for a personalized approach: paying extra for measurements, designers for visualization, and technologists for structural development.
